member.name: T:Ci.Sequential.Byte
member.summary: Static methods to set and retrieve the timestamp for a byte-order variant COMB Guid.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Byte.Create
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of a random Guid combined with the current UTC timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Byte.Create(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of the specified Guid combined with the current UTC timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Byte.Create(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of a random Guid combined with the provided timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Byte.Create(System.Guid,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of the provided Guid and provided timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Byte.GetTimestamp(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the timestamp previously stored in a COMB Guid value.

member.name: T:Ci.Sequential.Guid
member.summary: Static methods to set and retrieve the timestamp for an MSSQL-order variant COMB Guid.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Guid.Create
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of a random Guid combined with the current UTC timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Guid.Create(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of the specified Guid combined with the current UTC timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Guid.Create(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of a random Guid combined with the provided timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Guid.Create(System.Guid,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a new Guid COMB, consisting of the provided Guid and provided timestamp.

member.name: M:Ci.Sequential.Guid.GetTimestamp(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the timestamp previously stored in a COMB Guid value.

member.name: T:Ci.Sequential.Utilities
member.summary: Common constants and functions for both COMB implementations.
